ProductInfo.Features:
Long life LED edge lighting
Standard 720p HDTV resolution. 1366 pixels wide by 768 pixels.
The Hitachi anti-glare screen eliminates reflections so you can enjoy your HDTV without unwanted distractions.
Hitachi's state-of-the-art video processor is a supercomputer dedicated to video. Hitachi has over 50 years of experience in fine tuning teleivision pictures and the PicturePerfect processor produces an exceptionally sharp, detailed and noise free image.
All of the UltraVision LCD TVs are energy efficient and ENERGY STAR® qualified.
ProductInfo.Name: Hitachi LE29H307 29" Class UltraThin LED LCD TV 720P
